# [Resources](/docs/resources) / Audio

If you'd like to create a visualisation project, based on data, those APIs could potential help you:

-   [https://github.com/public-apis/public-apis](https://github.com/public-apis/public-apis)
-   [https://www.usgs.gov/products/data-and-tools/real-time-data](https://www.usgs.gov/products/data-and-tools/real-time-data)
-   [https://dev.socrata.com/](https://dev.socrata.com/)
-   [https://metapine.com/](https://metapine.com/)
-   [https://www.reddit.com/r/datasets/](https://www.reddit.com/r/datasets/)
-   [https://labs.strava.com/](https://labs.strava.com/)
